span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt. 提供住处，隐匿： to provide a place, home, or habitat for
【例】 harbor a fugitive逃亡者
【近】 accommodate, bestow, board, camp, chamber, domicile, lodge, quarter, take in, put up
【反】 evict 赶出
【考法 2】 v. 认为，牢记： to keep in one's mind or heart
【例】 he had long harbored a grudge against his old employer, who had fired him without cause 他对他的前老板一直耿耿于怀，无缘无故炒了他
【近】 bear, cherish, entertain, hold, nurse
【记】 音：航泊，航船停泊处；海泊，海里停泊处；husband 丈夫是避风港
